title: Police searching for missing 34-year-old woman; do you recognize her?
description: An area police department is searching for 34-year-old Chelsey Sears.
content:
Do you recognize this woman?

The Hamilton Police Department wrote on a social media post that they are searching for 34-year-old Chelsey Sears.

She is 4 feet, 11 inches tall and weighs 170 pounds with brown hair and hazel eyes.
• None Traffic pattern changes in effect on major highway in Greene County
• None New study finds Ohio has third most wage theft violations in country

Sears was last seen on S. 11th Street, according to the department.

She was also wearing green and white shoes, jeans, and a black t-shirt.

Contact Detective Sorrell at (513) 868-5811, extension 1289, if you have any information.
summary: The Hamilton Police Department is searching for 34-year-old woman named Chelsey. She is 4 feet, 11 inches tall and weighs 170 pounds with brown hair and hazel eyes. The last time she was seen was on S. 11th Street. If you know more about Chelsey, call the police at (419)
shortSummary: The Hamilton Police are searching for 34-year-old Chelsey Sears, described as "extremely rare" by some as she is known to be missing;
